GR14kbss_1-u:2198: janaś chidrānveṣī sa khalu capalo nanda-tanayaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2201: na ati hṛdayaṃ kiṃ nu karavai/
GR14kbss_1-u:2203: mātaḥ/ satyaṃ vadati bhavatī kiṃca gopendra-sūnur
GR14kbss_1-u:2209: bhītir nītis tava nava-vadhū-pālanaṃ cāpi yuktam
GR14kbss_1-u:2210: māśaṅkiṣṭhās tad ayati yathā dṛk-pathaṃ nāsya sādhvyāś
GR14kbss_1-u:2211: chāyāpy asyāḥ svayam aham imāṃ drāk tathā te'rpayāmi
GR14kbss_1-u:2224: py anicchuvad gantum uvāca tāṃ sakhīm
GR14kbss_1-u:2225: astīha kṛtyaṃ na ca me yiyāsutā
GR14kbss_1-u:2234: kim iha satīḥ sa jahāti lokanāthaḥ?
GR14kbss_1-u:2241: kim api nigadya babhūva sāpi tūṣṇīm
GR14kbss_1-u:2245: bhītāsi kiṃ sādhvy aham asmy avitrī-
GR14kbss_1-u:2269: bhartā gobhiḥ svagoṣṭhe ghaṭayitum akhilāṃ rātrim eva nyavātsīt
GR14kbss_1-u:2270: vakṣaḥ prodyan nakhāṅkāvali-citam adharaḥ spaṣṭa-danta-kṣato yat
GR14kbss_1-u:2271: tat sādhvyās te satītvaṃ samucitam adhunā vyaktam ullālasīti
GR14kbss_1-u:2279: adaśad adharam uccais tan-nakhāco itaṃ tad-
GR14kbss_1-u:2280: dhṛdayam idam amuṣyāḥ kiṃ vṛthā śaṅkase tvam
GR14kbss_1-u:2304: yadi calati tadā kutaḥ kva yāmī-
GR14kbss_1-u:2339: kim api jagāda ca tāṃ tadaiva kaundī
GR14kbss_1-u:2343: tava savayaḥ sada eva yat pramāṇam
GR14kbss_1-u:2345: dhṛtim iha hṛdi dhartum īśiṣe no
GR14kbss_1-u:2354: tad api niyokṣyasi hā punas tam asyām
GR14kbss_1-u:2394: sakhi/ kim aparam asti vartma pādau
GR14kbss_1-u:2395: na mama puraś calato 'sya kiṃ karomi
GR14kbss_1-u:2398: karaṇa-paṭus tava kiṃ bhiyā hriyā vā
GR14kbss_1-u:2400: laghu laghu gantum iyeṣa sā tad agre
GR14kbss_1-u:2405: laya iti varṇayituṃ na gīr apīṣṭe
GR14kbss_1-u:2425: bhavasi na vety uditāha sā svasakhyā
GR14kbss_1-u:2448: saprāṇāḥ kim amī ime kim atha vety unmīlataḥ saṃśayād-
GR14kbss_1-u:2500: dara-rucir api vatsaḥ saspṛhaṃ me yathātti
GR14kbss_1-u:2508: tvam iha rasavatīṃ me yāhi rādhe/ prayatnāt
GR14kbss_1-u:2516: trijagati na hi kaścit tvām ṛte yasya vettā
GR14kbss_1-u:2549: śaśimukhi/ va akāni tvaṃ vidhehi prayatnād
GR14kbss_1-u:2640: pālīḥ smitena mṛdunā vacasā ca bālā
GR14kbss_1-u:2653: yad yena yena vidhinā ruciratvam etya
GR14kbss_1-u:2654: yad vyañjane yad upayujyata ity avetya
GR14kbss_1-u:2680: yad yatra yatra lavaṇaṃ ca tathā pramāṇaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:2694: kim api jagāda paṭur baṭuṃ miṣeṇa
GR14kbss_1-u:2697: kiṃ kiṃ tvayā sādhitam etayā saha
GR14kbss_1-u:2704: rādhāṃ praśaṃsanty atha tāṃ ca rohiṇī
GR14kbss_1-u:2842: madhye hemamayī vyadhāyi rucirā pātrī śubhair odanaiḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2846: yuktāṃ dakṣiṇato nidhāya nika e tasyāś ca bhṛṅgārakān
GR14kbss_1-u:2847: karpūreṇa suvāsitena payasā pūrṇān vyadhāt kānakān
GR14kbss_1-u:2851: ānetuṃ prajighāya vatsala-manāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sā
GR14kbss_1-u:2852: dhātreyīm atha tau samīyatur atiśraddhā-vaśād añjasā
GR14kbss_1-u:2854: natvā mātaram ājñayā saha-balas tasyāḥ samullāsanaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2864: mātṛbhyāṃ krama-darśitena hi pathā bhoktuṃ samārabdhavān
GR14kbss_1-u:2865: yad yad bhoktum upakramaṃ sma kurute tyaktuṃ na tat soḍhavān
GR14kbss_1-u:2866: bhoktuṃ tat tad aśeṣam apy abhilaṣan sāmarthyavāṃś ca svayaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:2867: kiñcit kiñcid abhukta vīkṣaka-bhiyā durvāda-bhītyāpy ayam
GR14kbss_1-u:2870: svāduṅkāram adann avāg api hṛdā so 'pi praśaṃsann alam
GR14kbss_1-u:2875: ny ādan mātṛ-mude bhaved api yathā paktrī-manorañjanā
GR14kbss_1-u:2876: tān sarvān saha-bhojinaḥ sarasayā vācā hasan hāsayan
GR14kbss_1-u:2877: bhuñjadhvaṃ na parityajeta kim apīty ekāntam āhlādayan
GR14kbss_1-u:2937: kīśeśo dadhi-lampa o 'yam iti tān kṛtvonmukhāṃs tad-diśi
GR14kbss_1-u:2938: teṣāṃ bhojana-bhājaneṣu śanakair nikṣipya bhakṣyaṃ nijaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:2939: sarvaṃ bhuktam idaṃ mayeti sa punar garvāyamāno 'vadat
GR14kbss_1-u:3144: svāduṅkāraṃ kamala-nayanaḥ saspṛhaṃ tat tad annaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3147: prāśnann ambā-manasi nibiḍaṃ sa pramodaṃ vyatānīt
GR14kbss_1-u:3156: mṛdu mṛdu madhurānnaṃ preyasīṃ prekṣya kṛṣṇaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3185: kṣut-kṣāmo 'si tvaṃ ca nāśnāsi tat tām
GR14kbss_1-u:3186: ambām etāṃ māṃ ca kiṃvā dunoṣi
GR14kbss_1-u:3195: taṃ vīkṣya mandaṃ punar apy adantaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3207: py atṛptā taṃ tṛptaṃ muhur atha sutaṃ prāśayad iyam
GR14kbss_1-u:3215: ny āmṛjya sādhu mṛduleṣikayā ca dantān
GR14kbss_1-u:3227: kuleṣv atha viśaśramuḥ parijanair amī vījitāḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3252: janani/ mayi jananyāṃ kiṃ nu lajjedṛśīyaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3253: suta iva mama cetaḥ snihyati tvayy atīva
GR14kbss_1-u:3254: ayi tad apanayaināṃ yāmi nirmañcanaṃ te
GR14kbss_1-u:3255: śiśiraya mama netraṃ bhuṅkṣva paśyāmi sākṣāt
GR14kbss_1-u:3257: yūyaṃ ca me stha tanayās tv anayā hriyā kiṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3264: pa air mārjitvā ca svaparijana-dattā himakarā
GR14kbss_1-u:3265: viyuktā vī īs tā vara-kanaka-gauryo bubhujire
GR14kbss_1-u:3268: tad bhūṣaṇaiḥ subahuśaḥ saha yāni yatnāt
